subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: When Hank Aaron broke the career home-run record 33 years ago, Vin Scully made a call that evoked race, history and the American experience. Barry Bonds should not expect the same.
snippet: When Hank Aaron broke the career home-run record 33 years ago, Vin Scully made a call that evoked race, history and the American experience. Barry Bonds should not expect the same.
